About Joelle

I recently graduated from San Jose State University(SJSU) with a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics with Statistics concentration where I developed solid background in Statistics, Data Science, and Machine Learning.
I'm pursuing Master of Entrepreneurship & Innovation degree at Korea Advanced Institute of Science & Technology(KAIST) to enhance my business skills in Marketing and Entrepreneurship.
